title: Consent Status
description: Schema for tracking parental/guardian consent status for learner engagement with the John T Hope Centre

id.description: Unique identifier for this consent record

learner_id.description: Unique identifier for the learner to whom this consent applies

parent_or_guardian_id.description: Unique identifier for the parent or guardian providing consent

consent_type.description: The specific type of consent being granted or denied

granted.description: Whether consent has been granted (true) or denied/revoked (false)

granted_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when consent was granted or last updated

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when consent expires, if applicable. Null indicates no expiration.

notes.description: Optional notes providing context for the consent decision
